flowRoot.flowPara: Because most CAN controllers and drivers implement FIFOs, CanFestival consider sending message as a non bloking operation.
In order to prevent reentrent calls to the stack, messages reception is implemented differently on µC and OS.:
- µC must provide interuption masking for timer and can receive IT
- OS must provide a receive thread, a timer thread and a mutex. CAN reception is a bloking operation.
